Description_lang: Judges the target, dealing $s1 $?s403664[Holystrike][Holy] damage$?s231663[, and causing them to take $197277s1% increased damage from your next Holy Power ability.][.]$?s315867[|cFFFFFFFFGenerates $220637s1 Holy Power.][]

description_blz.en_US: Judges the target, dealing 3,757 Holy damage.
description_blz.es_MX: Sentencia al objetivo, lo que inflige 3,730 p. de daño sagrado.
description_blz.pt_BR: Julga o alvo, causando 3.706 de dano Sagrado.
description_blz.de_DE: Richtet das Ziel und fügt ihm 3.673 Heiligschaden zu.
description_blz.en_GB: Judges the target, dealing 3,691 Holy damage.

description_blz.fr_FR: Vous jugez la cible, ce qui lui inflige 3707 points de dégâts du sacré.
description_blz.it_IT: Giudica il bersaglio, infliggendo 3.662 danni da sacro.
description_blz.ru_RU: Вы выносите цели приговор, нанося 3668 ед. урона от светлой магии.
